shrimp.name: WardAniso
shrimp.description: Greg Ward Larson anisotropic shading model
shrimp.author: rconstruct

input.name: uroughness
input.description: The apparent roughness of the surface in xdir.

input.name: vroughness
input.description: The apparent roughness of the surface in a tangent perpendicular to xdir

shrimp.usage: Gregory J. Ward's anisotropic specular term. "Uroughness" and "vroughness" control the apparent surface roughness in the anisotropy X and Y directions respectively, being the default direction "dPdv". The specular color value is passed to "aov_specularcolor", while the specular value is passed to the "aov_specular" AOV presets.
